name: TYPE/RUNNER
description:
TYPE/RUNNER is a small typing game where you control the fate of a little robot running across the top of your words.  Type the correct letters to create platforms under your robot as he runs for the finish line.  Type too slowly, and they'll run right off the edge. It's not all about speed, though - incorrect letters will slow them down, and if they fall too far behind they're done for! Type quickly and accurately in order to see your little robot safely home. 

Choose from 4 different difficulty levels, and see how high you can score!

Developed in  4 days with JavaScript using the Kaboom js game library. Features random quotes pulled from the Quotable API.

CREDITS:

ToasterBot Sprite: penusbmic

Sound Effects: JDWasabi
